name: COLLATERAL DAMAGE (Juanda999)
description:
My submision for the 20 seconds jam, maded in 2 weeks.

SUMMARY

You are a office worker taking a break, when you decide to get back to the job, ¡you found a bomb!, why is a bomb in the office?, it doesnt matter. Your goal is to take the bomb and minimice all the possible damage, so be careful, you can not decide if the bomb explode or not, but you can decide where is the place to make less damage.

CONTROLS
 Move the player with W,A,S,D.

I am not the owner of the assets used in this games, all the credits goes to the respective creators on Poly.pizza, Dafont and OpenGameArt
